name: Blue-Eyes Solid Dragon
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can shuffle this card from the field into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Blue-Eyes Solid Dragon" once per turn.
